title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.6 - Extended period of absence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.6 - Extended period of absence

State Regulations

Those employees enjoying privileges at OGS parking
facilities are required to notify the attendant at the facility if extended
periods (one month or more) of absence from the facility should occur. In
accordance with OGS policy, the employee will be responsible for payment of
applicable fees during the first six months of absence, except where it results
from approved medical leave. Permits will be held by OGS for up to six
additional months at no charge to the employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
296-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
